title: A1502 820-4924 restarts all the time when power on after liquid spilled repair
message:
having 2015 a1502 820-4924.
machine came in with no power at all,liquid spilled. ultrasonic cleaned and replaced most heavy spilled components.

power back on already, hear the chime, then restarts,chime , then restarts, chime then loops....feels like the  P+R+COMMAND+OPTION reset thing going on all the automatically.

tried disconnected keyboard and touch pad, same
onoff_smc =3.3v
ws_kbd_onoff_l=3.3v

voltage on pin 1,2,3  are 0 on J4813(keyboard connector)
diode mode on them are all around 400+

so I replaced U4850, same stuffs.
doubted corrosion under U4820 and U4830, flux and heated , but same stuffs still

any suggestions please?
thank you!

title: A1502 820-4924 restarts all the time when power on after liquid spilled repair
A1502 820-4924 restarts all the time when power on after liquid spilled repair
message: Could be corrupt OS, so remove SSD. Could be 100 other corroded things too......

title: A1502 820-4924 restarts all the time when power on after liquid spilled repair
message: it actually restarts before it loads the OS , I tried another SSD already,but same story.

title: A1502 820-4924 restarts all the time when power on after liquid spilled repair
message:

machine came in with no power at all,liquid spilled. ultrasonic cleaned and replaced most heavy spilled components.

power back on already, hear the chime, then restarts,chime , then restarts, chime then loops....feels like the P+R+COMMAND+OPTION reset thing going on all the automatically.

tried disconnected keyboard and touch pad, same
onoff_smc =3.3v
ws_kbd_onoff_l=3.3v

voltage on pin 1,2,3 are 0 on J4813(keyboard connector)
diode mode on them are all around 400+

so I replaced U4850, same stuffs.
doubted corrosion under U4820 and U4830, flux and heated , but same stuffs still

change the key board connector on board /   try without key board see if its restart

title: A1502 820-4924 restarts all the time when power on after liquid spilled repair
message: I tried without the keyboard already, same stuffs. check the connector carefully couple times , it shouldn't be the issue, i check voltage on ONOFF_SMC, not low ,so nothing to do with the connector shorting it to GND

title: A1502 820-4924 restarts all the time when power on after liquid spilled repair
message: Corrosion somewhere. I had one with a similar issue and there was corrosion in the CPU Vcore power supply area. But it could be so many other things. Inspect carefully for corroded resistors and traces.

title: A1502 820-4924 restarts all the time when power on after liquid spilled repair
message: Now I regret about the Ultrasonic process,really makes it way harder to find. so many areas got spilled for this one. seems like no regular routines can go and check by multimeter,will just look around otherwise just give up if nothing found

title: A1502 820-4924 restarts all the time when power on after liquid spilled repair
message:
[QUOTE="roy.ruan, post: 17548"]i tried without the keyboard already, same stuffs. Check the connector carefully couple times , it shouldn't be the issue, i check voltage on onoff_smc, not low ,so nothing to do with the connector shorting it to gnd[/quote]

remove the connector , there is short inside connector, then try
